greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)=1 for n <= s+k; thereafter a(n) = Sum(a(n-i-s-a(n-i-1)),i=0..k-1) where s=0, k=4.
reference: Callaghan, Joseph, John J. Chew III, and Stephen M. Tanny. "On the behavior of a family of meta-Fibonacci sequences." SIAM Journal on Discrete Mathematics 18.4 (2005): 794-824. See Eq. (1.7) and Table 6.1
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
xref: Callaghan et al. (2005)'s sequences T_{0,k}(n) for k=1 through 7 are A000012, A046699, A046702, A240835, A241154, A241155, A240830.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 16 2014
